ValidationRule.description: When User Local Cheque of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD No.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Local Cheque') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c , 'Forex') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Local Cheque of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection Pick List,Cheque/DD No. cann't be blank.
